text: What do they mean? I think you know by now. It means you're a Fallen. Stop trying to be coy and tell me what crime you committed.
Look, I'm sorry. I want to help people. If you can tell me what you did we can try to bring angels back to redemption.
<Lie> Tell me and I let you go. Simple as that. You're not getting out of this otherwise and you need someone on your corner. Let me be that person.
